The claim originated from a fake news ar: 2. The alleged quote attributed to Hillary Clinton threatening NBC executives with hanging from nooses if she lost the election was not found in any leaked or disclosed emails.
The meme version of the quote: claiming it was written in an angry email to Donna Brazile, is unlikely since the email was supposedly sent five weeks after the article that first attributed the quote to Clinton.
Reputable news entities and fact: checking websites, such as Snopes, have debunked the claim and labeled it as a fabrication.
